title: [Large-Scale] Science Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Course Using Collaborative Role-Play Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific theories and laboratory safety protocols
context.additional_context: Team role-based scenario-driven learning in a smartphone-based LMS environment, with real-time feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can apply collaborative strategies to solve problems in role-play simulations based on real-life science experiment scenarios.
Learners can simulate the scientific decision-making process in a goal-based learning environment and design response plans for experimental errors.
Learners can analyze individual weaknesses identified during collaborative processes through formative assessment and develop improvement plans.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
